00042 BodyPathMap::BodyPathMap( ) {
00043 }
00044 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 BodyPathMap::BodyPathMap( const BodyPathMap &that ) {
00046         POSITION pos = that.GetStartPosition();
00047         while (pos) {
00048                 int i; BodyPath *b;
00049                 that.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00050                 this->SetAt(i, new BodyPath(*b));
00051         }
00052 }
00053 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 BodyPathMap& BodyPathMap::operator=( const BodyPathMap &that )  { 
00055         RemoveAll();
00056         POSITION pos = that.GetStartPosition();
00057         while (pos) {
00058                 int i; BodyPath *b;
00059                 that.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00060                 this->SetAt(i, new BodyPath(*b));
00061         }
00062         return *this;
00063 }
00064 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 BodyPath* BodyPathMap::GetRandomValue() {
00066         int i_random = cvRandInt(&rnd_seed) % GetCount(); 
00067         POSITION pos = GetStartPosition();
00068         int i=0;
00069         while (pos) {
00070                 int id; BodyPath *b;
00071                 GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00072                 if (i == i_random)
00073                         return b;
00074                 i++;
00075         }
00076         return NULL;
00077 }
00078 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 BodyPath*& BodyPathMap::operator[](int key) {
00080         BodyPath *b;
00081         if (Lookup(key, b))
00082                 delete b;
00083         return CMap<int, int, BodyPath*, BodyPath*>::operator[](key);
00084 }
00085 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 void BodyPathMap::SetAt(int key, BodyPath* value) {
00087         BodyPath *b;
00088         if (Lookup(key, b))
00089                 delete b;
00090         CMap<int, int, BodyPath*, BodyPath*>::SetAt(key, value);
00091 }
00092 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 void BodyPathMap::RemoveKey(int id) {
00094         BodyPath *b;
00095         if (Lookup(id, b)) {
00096                 delete b;
00097                 CMap<int, int, BodyPath*, BodyPath*>::RemoveKey(id);
00098         }
00099 }
00100 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 void BodyPathMap::RemoveAll() {
00102         POSITION pos = GetStartPosition();
00103         while (pos) {
00104                 int id; BodyPath *b;
00105                 GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00106                 delete b;
00107         }
00108         CMap<int, int, BodyPath*, BodyPath*>::RemoveAll();
00109 }
00110 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111 void BodyPathMap::ChangeID(int id_old, int id_new) {
00112         if (id_old == id_new)
00113                 return;
00114 
00115         BodyPath *b_old, *b_new;
00116         if (Lookup(id_old, b_old)) {
00117                 if (Lookup(id_new, b_new))
00118                         RemoveKey(id_new);
00119                 b_new = new BodyPath(*b_old);
00120                 b_new->id = id_new;
00121                 SetAt(id_new, b_new);
00122                 RemoveKey(id_old);
00123         }
00124 }
00125 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00126 bool BodyPathMap::SwapID(int id1, int id2) {
00127         if (id1 == id2)
00128                 return true;
00129 
00130         BodyPath *b1, *b2;
00131         if (!Lookup(id1, b1) || !Lookup(id2, b2))
00132                 return false;
00133         BodyPath *b1copy = new BodyPath(*b1);
00134         BodyPath *b2copy = new BodyPath(*b2);
00135         RemoveKey(id1);
00136         RemoveKey(id2);
00137         b1copy->id = id2;
00138         b2copy->id = id1;
00139         SetAt(id1, b2copy);
00140         SetAt(id2, b1copy);
00141         return true;
00142 }

00163 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 void TrackingData::Put(int nFrame) {
00165         // how put deletes steps in bodypath?
00166         POSITION pos = doc->bodymodel.body.GetStartPosition();
00167         while (pos) {
00168                 int id; Body *b;
00169                 doc->bodymodel.body.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00170                 BodyPath *bp;
00171                 if (data.Lookup(id, bp)) {
00172                         if (nFrame < bp->startFrame || nFrame >= bp->startFrame+bp->GetCount())
00173                                 bp->Add(cvPoint2D32f(b->bot.x, b->bot.y), b->GetHeight(), b->GetWidth(), b->orientation, b->confidence, true);
00174                         else {
00175                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).p = cvPoint2D32f(b->bot.x, b->bot.y);
00176                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).height = b->GetHeight();
00177                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).width = b->GetWidth();
00178                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).orientation = b->orientation;
00179                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).confidence =  b->confidence; // TODO: what is being saved here ! must range [0,1]
00180                                 bp->GetAt(nFrame-bp->startFrame).visible = true;
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183                 else {
00184                         bp = new BodyPath(id, cvPoint2D32f(b->bot.x, b->bot.y), nFrame, b->GetHeight(), b->GetWidth(), b->orientation,  b->confidence, true);
00185                         data[id] = bp;
00186                 }
00187         }
00188 }
00189 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 void TrackingData::Get(int nFrame) {
00191         doc->bodymodel.body.RemoveAll();
00192         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00193         while (pos) {
00194                 int id; BodyPath *p;
00195                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00196                 if (nFrame >= p->startFrame && nFrame < p->startFrame + p->GetCount()) {                // paths occurs at this frame
00197                         Step s = p->GetAt(nFrame-p->startFrame);
00198                         if (s.visible) {
00199                                 Body *b_new = new Body(s.p, s.height, s.width, doc, id, p->startFrame);
00200                                 doc->bodymodel.body.SetAt(id, b_new);
00201                                 b_new->orientation = s.orientation;
00202                                 b_new->stopFrame = p->startFrame+p->GetUpperBound();
00203                                 
00204                                 // update id for newly created bodies
00205                                 if (id >= doc->bodymodel.last_id)
00206                                         doc->bodymodel.last_id = id+1;
00207                         }
00208                 }
00209         }
00210 }
00211 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 int TrackingData::GetLastRecordedFrame() {
00213         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00214         int lastFrame = -1;
00215         while (pos) {
00216                 int id; BodyPath *p;
00217                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00218                 lastFrame = max(lastFrame, p->startFrame + p->GetCount() - 1);
00219         }
00220         return lastFrame;
00221 }
00222 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00223 int TrackingData::GetLastRecordedID() {
00224         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00225         int lastID = 0;
00226         while (pos) {
00227                 int id; BodyPath *p;
00228                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
00229                 lastID = max(id, lastID);
00230         }
00231         return lastID;
00232 }
00233 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00234 bool TrackingData::ChangeID(int id_old, int id_new) {
00235         BodyPath *bp_old;
00236         if (data.Lookup(id_old, bp_old)) {
00237                 // merge two BodyPath's
00238                 BodyPath *bp_new;
00239                 if (data.Lookup(id_new, bp_new))
00240                         data.RemoveKey(id_new);
00241                 bp_new = new BodyPath(*bp_old);
00242                 bp_new->id = id_new;
00243                 data[id_new] = bp_new;
00244                 data.RemoveKey(id_old);
00245                 return true;
00246         }
00247         else 
00248                 return false;
00249 }

00255 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00256 bool TrackingData::AppendID(int id_master, int id_slave) {
00257         BodyPath *bp_master;
00258         if (data.Lookup(id_master, bp_master)) {
00259                 // merge two BodyPath's
00260                 BodyPath *bp_slave;
00261                 if (data.Lookup(id_slave, bp_slave))
00262                         bp_master->Append(bp_slave);
00263 
00264                 data.RemoveKey(id_slave);
00265                 return true;
00266         }
00267         else
00268                 return false;
00269 }
00270 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00271 bool TrackingData::MergeID(int id_master, int id_slave) {
00272         if (id_master == id_slave)
00273                 return false;
00274         BodyPath *bp_master;
00275         if (data.Lookup(id_master, bp_master)) {
00276                 // merge two BodyPath's
00277                 BodyPath *bp_slave;
00278                 if (data.Lookup(id_slave, bp_slave))
00279                         bp_master->Merge(bp_slave);
00280 
00281                 data.RemoveKey(id_slave);
00282                 
00283                 // replace id1's in current tracking
00284                 doc->bodymodel.body.ChangeID(id_slave, id_master);
00285                 doc->bodymodel.body_deleted.ChangeID(id_slave, id_master);
00286 
00287                 // if ID was the last one, then update last_id
00288                 if (id_slave == doc->bodymodel.last_id-1 && id_master < doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00289                         doc->bodymodel.last_id--;
00290                 if (id_master > doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00291                         doc->bodymodel.last_id = id_master+1;
00292                 return true;
00293         }
00294         else
00295                 return false;
00296 }

00298 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 bool TrackingData::SwapID(int id1, int id2) {
00300         BodyPath *bp1, *bp2;
00301         if (!data.Lookup(id1, bp1) || !data.Lookup(id2, bp2))
00302                 return false;
00303         BodyPath *bp1copy = new BodyPath(*bp1);
00304         BodyPath *bp2copy = new BodyPath(*bp2);
00305         data.RemoveKey(id1);
00306         data.RemoveKey(id2);
00307         bp1copy->id = id2;
00308         bp2copy->id = id1;
00309         data.SetAt(id1, bp2copy);
00310         data.SetAt(id2, bp1copy);
00311         return true;
00312 }
00313 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 int TrackingData::CountVisibleAt(int nFrame, int zoneID) {
00315         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00316         int count = 0;
00317         while (pos) {
00318                 int id; BodyPath *b;
00319                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00320                 if (nFrame < b->startFrame || nFrame > b->startFrame + b->GetUpperBound())
00321                         continue;
00322                 if (!b->GetAt(nFrame - b->startFrame).visible)
00323                         continue;
00324                 // If zone is defined, count only inside the zone
00325                 if (zoneID != -1) {
00326                         FloorRegion *z;
00327                         if (doc->zonemodel.zone.Lookup(zoneID, z)){
00328                                 if (z->IsRealPointIn(b->GetAt(nFrame - b->startFrame).p))
00329                                         count++;
00330                         }
00331                 }
00332                 else
00333                         count++;
00334 
00335         }
00336         return count;
00337 }
00338 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00339 int TrackingData::CountPresentAt(int nFrame) {
00340         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00341         int i=0;
00342         while (pos) {
00343                 int id; BodyPath *b;
00344                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00345                 int first = 0, last = 0;
00346                 b->GetFirstAndLastVisible(first, last);
00347                 if (first <= nFrame &&  last >= nFrame)
00348                         i++;
00349         }
00350         return i;
00351 }

00391 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00392 void TrackingData::ImportFromCVML(CString fname) {
00393 #if USE_CORELIBRARY
00394         if (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType != PROJECTION) {
00395                 AfxMessageBox("XML file format for Spherical Camera has not been created yet!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00396                 return;
00397         }
00398         SetProgressDialogRange(0, 100);
00399         JString filename = fname;
00400     JString xml = JFile::readAFileASCII(filename);
00401     if (xml.length() == 0) {
00402         AfxMessageBox("Could not read sequence file!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00403         return;
00404     }
00405         SetProgressDialogPos(20);
00406         XMLParser parser;
00407     if (!parser.parseXML(xml)) {
00408         AfxMessageBox("Error parsing sequence file!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00409         return;
00410     }
00411         SetProgressDialogPos(50);
00412     CVMLDataSet* newDataSet = new CVMLDataSet();
00413     if (!newDataSet->fromXML(parser.getRootNode())) {
00414                 AfxMessageBox("Could not understand sequence file!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00415         return;
00416     }
00417 
00418         SetProgressDialogRange(0, 2*newDataSet->getCount());
00419         for (int n=0; n < newDataSet->getCount(); n++) { // for each frame
00420                 SetProgressDialogPos(n+newDataSet->getCount());
00421                 CVMLFrame *frame = (CVMLFrame*)newDataSet->frames.get(n);
00422                 for (int i=0;i<frame->objects.getCount();i++) { // for each body
00423                         //printf("frame ##: %s\n", (char*) (frame->id));
00424                         CVMLObject* obj = (CVMLObject*)frame->objects.get(i);
00425                         CvPoint2D32f center = cvPoint2D32f(obj->getBox().getCMX(), obj->getBox().getCMY());
00426                         CvSize2D32f size = cvSize2D32f(obj->getBox().getWidth(), obj->getBox().getHeight());
00427                         // fit ellipse into bounding box
00428                         double angle = deg2rad(obj->getBox().orientation);
00429                         double co = cos(angle);
00430                         double si = sin(angle);
00431                         BlobRay br; 
00432                         double K = 0.7;
00433                         br.p1.x = (int)(center.x+co*K*size.height); br.p1.y = (int)(center.y-si*K*size.height);
00434                         br.p2.x = (int)(center.x-co*K*size.height); br.p2.y = (int)(center.y+si*K*size.height);
00435                         Body *b = new Body(&br, doc, obj->getID().toInt(), n);
00436                         BodyPath *bp;
00437                         if (data.Lookup(b->id, bp)) {
00438                                 bp->Add(cvPoint2D32f(b->bot.x, b->bot.y), b->GetHeight(), b->GetWidth(), b->orientation, b->confidence, obj->getAppearance().equals("visible"));
00439                         }
00440                         else {
00441                                 bp = new BodyPath(b->id, cvPoint2D32f(b->bot.x, b->bot.y), frame->id.toInt(), b->GetHeight(), b->GetWidth(), b->orientation, b->confidence, obj->getAppearance().equals("visible"));
00442                                 data[b->id] = bp;
00443                         }
00444 
00445                         delete b;
00446                 }
00447     }
00448         delete newDataSet;
00449 #endif
00450 }
00451 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00452 void TrackingData::ExportToCVML(CString fname) {
00453 #if USE_CORELIBRARY
00454         if (doc->cameramodel.m_cameraType != PROJECTION) {
00455                 AfxMessageBox("XML file format for Spherical Camera has not been created yet!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00456                 return;
00457         }
00458 
00459         // add all body paths to a single cluster
00460         BodyPathCluster *all_bodies = new BodyPathCluster();
00461         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00462         int i; BodyPath *p;
00463         while (pos) {
00464                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, p);
00465                 all_bodies->Add(p);
00466         }
00467 
00468         CVMLDataSet* newDataSet = new CVMLDataSet();
00469         int n_frames = all_bodies->last-all_bodies->first;
00470         SetProgressDialogRange(0, 2*n_frames);
00471         for (int n=all_bodies->first; n <= all_bodies->last; n++) { // for each frame
00472                 SetProgressDialogPos(n);
00473                 CVMLFrame *frame = new CVMLFrame();
00474                 frame->id = JString(n);
00475                 for (int i=0;i<all_bodies->path.GetCount();i++) { // for each body in the cluster
00476                         //printf("frame ##: %s\n", (char*) (frame->id));
00477                         // skip bodies not existing at this frame
00478                         BodyPath* p = all_bodies->path[i];
00479                         if ( (p->startFrame > n) || (p->startFrame+p->GetCount()-1 < n))
00480                                 continue;
00481                         // add body object to the frame object
00482                         else  { 
00483                                 Body b(p, doc, n);
00484                                 CvPoint2D32f head = b.GetImageHead();
00485                                 CvPoint2D32f foot = b.GetImageFoot();
00486                                 CvRect rect = b.GetBoundingRect();
00487                                 CVMLObject *obj = new CVMLObject();
00488                                 obj->id = b.id;
00489                                 obj->box = ::Box(rect.x, rect.y, rect.width, rect.height);
00490                                 obj->box.orientation = rad2deg(atan2(foot.y-head.y, head.x-foot.x));
00491                                 frame->addObject(obj);
00492                         }
00493                 }
00494                 newDataSet->addFrame(frame);
00495     }
00496         SetProgressDialogRange(0, 100);
00497         SetProgressDialogPos(50);
00498         JString xml = newDataSet->toXML();
00499     if (!xml.length()) {
00500                 AfxMessageBox("Could not convert to XML!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00501         return;
00502     }
00503         SetProgressDialogPos(90);
00504         JString filename = fname;
00505         if (!JFile::writeAFileASCII(filename, xml)) {
00506         AfxMessageBox("Could not write to sequence file!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00507         return;
00508     }
00509         SetProgressDialogPos(100);
00510         delete newDataSet;
00511         delete all_bodies;
00512 #endif
00513 }
00514 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00515 void TrackingData::ExportToX3D(CString fname) {
00516         X3DDriver xd;
00517         //temp:
00518         //xd.LoadX3D("F:\\My Documents\\Visual Studio 2005\\Projects\\X3D Models\\sample.x3d");
00519          
00520         // x <-> y to convert from left-coordinate system to right coordinate system
00521         CString minmaxExt;
00522         minmaxExt.Format("%.2f %.2f 0, %.2f %.2f 0, %.2f %.2f 0, %.2f %.2f 0", 
00523                 doc->floormodel.floormin.y, 
00524                 doc->floormodel.floormin.x,
00525                 doc->floormodel.floormax.y, 
00526                 doc->floormodel.floormin.x, 
00527                 doc->floormodel.floormax.y, 
00528                 doc->floormodel.floormax.x, 
00529                 doc->floormodel.floormin.y, 
00530                 doc->floormodel.floormax.x);
00531         xd.ClearScene();
00532         xd.SetViewPoint();
00533         //double totalFrames = doc->trackermodel.m_frameStop;
00534         double totalFrames = 6000;
00535         CString duration; duration.Format("%.2f", totalFrames/doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate);
00536         xd.AddTimeSensor("myTimeSensor", duration);
00537         xd.AddFloorImage(doc->floormodel.m_sourcename, minmaxExt);
00538         // --------- Add bodies
00539         int cc=0;
00540         for (POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();pos;) {
00541                 int id; BodyPath *b;
00542                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, b);
00543                 if (b->startFrame > totalFrames)
00544                         continue;
00545                 CString s, coords="", ctimes="", orients="", otimes="", tcoords="", ttimes="";
00546                 boolean visible = false;
00547                 int SIGMA = 10;
00548                 // set initial invisibility
00549                 ttimes += "0 ";
00550                 tcoords += "-1 ";
00551                 int SAMPLING_FREQUENCY = 15;
00552 
00553                 for (int i=0;i<b->GetCount();i+=SAMPLING_FREQUENCY) {
00554                         // x <-> y to convert from left-coordinate system to right coordinate system
00555                         CvPoint2D32f point = b->Smooth(b->startFrame+i, SIGMA);
00556                         s.Format("%.2f %.2f 0", point.y, point.x);
00557                         if (i<b->GetCount()-SAMPLING_FREQUENCY)
00558                                 s+=", ";
00559                         coords += s;
00560                         double a = b->GetMotionAngle(b->startFrame+i, SIGMA);
00561                         if (a != -10) {
00562                                 s.Format("0 0 1 %.2f", PI-a);
00563                                 if (i<b->GetCount()-SAMPLING_FREQUENCY)
00564                                         s+=", ";
00565                                 orients += s;
00566                                 s.Format("%.5f ", ((double)(b->startFrame+i))/totalFrames);
00567                                 otimes += s;
00568                         }
00569                         s.Format("%.5f ", ((double)(b->startFrame+i))/totalFrames);
00570                         ctimes += s;
00571                         //change to visible
00572                         if (b->GetAt(i).visible && !visible) {
00573                                 ttimes += s;
00574                                 tcoords += "0 ";
00575                                 visible = true;
00576                         }
00577                         //change to invisible
00578                         if (!b->GetAt(i).visible && visible) {
00579                                 ttimes += s;
00580                                 tcoords += "-1 ";
00581                                 visible = false;
00582                         }
00583                 }
00584 
00585                 CString avatar;
00586                 CString gender="";
00587                 b->tags.Lookup("Gender", gender);
00588                 if (gender == "Male")
00589                         avatar = "http://www.vrinternal.com/lib/avatars/male/male05.wrl";
00590                 else if (gender == "Female")
00591                         avatar = "http://www.vrinternal.com/lib/avatars/female/female09.wrl";
00592                 else 
00593                         avatar = "http://www.vrinternal.com/lib/avatars/male/male07.wrl";
00594 
00595                 xd.AddTrack(id, avatar, coords, ctimes, orients, otimes, tcoords, ttimes);
00596                 
00597                 //if (cc>5)
00598                 //      break;
00599                 //cc++;
00600         }
00601 
00602         // --------- Add obstacles
00603         for (int i=0;i < doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle.GetCount();i++) {
00604                 CString center="", size="";
00605                 // x <-> y to convert from left-coordinate system to right coordinate system
00606                 Cuboid *box = (Cuboid*)doc->obstaclemodel.obstacle[i];
00607                 center.Format("%.2f %.2f %.2f", (box->v[0].y+box->v[6].y)/2, (box->v[0].x+box->v[6].x)/2, (box->v[0].z+box->v[6].z)/2);         
00608                 size.Format("%.2f %.2f %.2f", fabs(box->v[0].y-box->v[6].y), fabs(box->v[0].x-box->v[6].x), fabs(box->v[0].z-box->v[6].z));             
00609                 xd.AddObstacle(box->id, center, size, box->label);
00610         }
00611         xd.SaveX3D(fname);
00612 }
00613 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00614 void TrackingData::ImportFromCSV(CString fname) {
00615         AfxMessageBox("Importing tracking data from CSV is not supported!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00616 }
00617 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00618 void TrackingData::ExportToCSV(CString fname) {
00619         gcroot<NewVision::TrackExportSettings^> tSettings;
00620         tSettings = gcnew NewVision::TrackExportSettings();
00621         if (tSettings->ShowDialog() != ::DialogResult::OK)
00622                 return;
00623         String ^fnametracks = gcnew String(fname);
00624         String ^fnameevents  = gcnew String(fname);
00625         String ^fnamezones  = gcnew String(fname);
00626         StreamWriter^ srtracks = File::CreateText(fnametracks->Replace(".csv", ".tracks.csv"));
00627         StreamWriter^ srevents = File::CreateText(fnameevents->Replace(".csv", ".events.csv"));
00628         StreamWriter^ srzones = File::CreateText(fnamezones->Replace(".csv", ".zones.csv"));
00629 
00630         SetProgressDialogRange(0, data.GetCount());
00631         // Tracks header
00632         srtracks->Write("TrackID,Height,Width,Confidence,GroupID,GroupSize,StartTime,Duration,PercentOfTimeVisible,PeopleOnBegin,PeopleOnEnd,DistanceCovered,AreaCovered,ObjectsZonesShopped,TrackedToExit,"); 
00633         // WRITE: UserDefinedTag1, UserDefinedTag2 names
00634         System::Configuration::KeyValueConfigurationCollection ^settings
00635                 = ConfigurationManager::OpenExeConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel::None)->AppSettings->Settings;
00636         KeyValueConfigurationElement ^tags = settings["tags"];
00637         if (!tags) {
00638                 AfxMessageBox("XML file with pedestrian tag definitions not found!");
00639                 return;
00640         }
00641         CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter ^cv = gcnew CommaDelimitedStringCollectionConverter();
00642         CommaDelimitedStringCollection ^values2names = (CommaDelimitedStringCollection ^)cv->ConvertFromString(tags->Value);
00643         for (int i=0;i<values2names->Count;i++) {
00644                 String^ printableName = Regex::Replace(values2names[i], " ", "_"); // replace all spaces with an underscore
00645                 printableName = Regex::Replace(printableName, "[^\\w]", ""); // strip all non-alphanumeric characters
00646                 srtracks->Write(printableName);
00647                 if (i< values2names->Count-1)
00648                         srtracks->Write(",");
00649         }
00650         srtracks->WriteLine();
00651         // Events header
00652         srevents->Write("TrackID,ObjectZoneID,StartTime,Duration,PercentOfTimeVisible,Direction,PeopleOnBegin,PeopleOnEnd,");
00653         if (tSettings->crowdingBefore)
00654                 srevents->Write("People30SecBefore,People60SecBefore,People90SecBefore,People120SecBefore,");
00655         srevents->WriteLine("DistanceCovered, AreaCovered");    
00656         // Zones header
00657         srzones->WriteLine("ObjectZoneID,ObjectZoneName");      
00658 
00659         for (POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();pos;) {
00660                 // ======================== WRITE TRACKS ===============================
00661                 int i; BodyPath *b;
00662                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, b);
00663                 // WRITE: TrackID, Height, Width
00664                 srtracks->Write("{0},{1:F2},{2:F2},", i, meters2feet(b->GetHeight()/100), meters2feet(b->GetWidth()/100));
00665 
00666                 // WRITE: Confidence
00667                 srtracks->Write("{0:F2},", b->autoConfidence*100);
00668                 
00669                 // WRITE: GroupID, GroupSize
00670                 if (tSettings->groupData) {
00671                         // find first matching grouping activity
00672                         int aid = -1;  SwarmActivity* activity; bool found = false;
00673                         for (POSITION pos = doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL; ) {
00674                                 
00675                                 doc->m_ActivityData.sActivity.GetNextAssoc(pos, aid, activity); 
00676                                 // found "grouping" activity, write and break
00677                                 double actorD;
00678                                 if (activity->type == "GROUPING" && activity->actors.Lookup(i, actorD)) {
00679                                         srtracks->Write("{0},{1},", aid, activity->actors.GetCount());
00680                                         found = true;
00681                                         break;
00682                                 }
00683                         }
00684                         // none found, write blank
00685                         if (!found)
00686                                 srtracks->Write(",,");
00687                 }
00688                 else 
00689                         srtracks->Write(",,");
00690                 
00691                 // WRITE: StartTime, Duration, PercentOfTimeVisible
00692                 int first = 0, last = 0;
00693                 b->GetFirstAndLastVisible(first, last);
00694                 String ^start = doc->trackermodel.GetDateTime(first).ToString("dd-MMM-yy HH:mm:ss", DateTimeFormatInfo::InvariantInfo);
00695                 String ^stop  = doc->trackermodel.GetTimeSpan(last-first).ToString(); 
00696                 srtracks->Write("{0},{1},{2:F2},", start, stop, 100.0*b->CountVisibleFrames()/(last-first+1));
00697 
00698                 // WRITE: PeopleOnBegin, PeopleOnEnd
00699                 if (tSettings->crowdingData) {
00700                         srtracks->Write("{0},{1},", CountPresentAt(first)-1, CountPresentAt(last)-1); // exclude itself
00701                 }
00702                 else 
00703                         srtracks->Write(",,");
00704 
00705                 // WRITE: DistanceCovered, AreaCovered
00706                 srtracks->Write("{0:F2},{1:F2},", meters2feet(b->GetDistanceCovered()/100), metersSQ2feetSQ(b->GetAreaCovered()/10000));
00707 
00708 
00709                 // ======================== WRITE EVENTS ===============================
00710                 int eventCount = 0;
00711                 if (tSettings->zoneStatistics) {
00712                         POSITION posZ = doc->zonemodel.zone.GetStartPosition();
00713                         while (posZ) { // for each zone
00714                                 int iz; FloorRegion *z;
00715                                 doc->zonemodel.zone.GetNextAssoc(posZ, iz, z);
00716                                 CArray<IntPair, IntPair&> list;
00717                                 b->ListZoneEvents(z, list, Int32::Parse(tSettings->allowOutsideFor->Text));
00718                                 for (int ie = 0; ie < list.GetCount(); ie++) { // for each zone event
00719                                         int zoneFirst = list[ie].id1, zoneLast = list[ie].id2;
00720                                         // WRITE: TrackID, ObjectZoneID
00721                                         srevents->Write("{0},{1},", i, z->id);
00722                                 
00723                                         // WRITE: StartTime, Duration, PercentOfTimeVisible
00724                                         start = doc->trackermodel.GetDateTime(zoneFirst).ToString("dd-MMM-yy HH:mm:ss", DateTimeFormatInfo::InvariantInfo);
00725                                         stop  = doc->trackermodel.GetTimeSpan(zoneLast-zoneFirst).ToString(); 
00726                                         srevents->Write("{0},{1},{2:F2},", start, stop, 100.0*b->CountVisibleFrames(zoneFirst, zoneLast)/(zoneLast-zoneFirst+1));
00727 
00728                                         // WRITE: Direction
00729                                         srevents->Write(",");
00730                                         // TODO: get direction of 'b' through 'obst'
00731 
00732                                         // WRITE: PeopleOnBegin, PeopleOnEnd
00733                                         if (tSettings->crowdingData) {
00734                                                 srevents->Write("{0},{1},", CountVisibleAt(zoneFirst, iz)-1, CountVisibleAt(zoneLast, iz)); // on entrance, exclude itself; on exit the track itself is already out of the zone
00735                                         }
00736                                         else 
00737                                                 srevents->Write(",,");
00738 
00739                                         // WRITE: 30, 60, 90, 120 "sec before" columns
00740                                         if (tSettings->crowdingBefore) {
00741                                                 srevents->Write("{0},{1},{2},{3},", 
00742                                                         CountVisibleAt(zoneFirst-30*doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate, iz), 
00743                                                         CountVisibleAt(zoneFirst-60*doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate, iz), 
00744                                                         CountVisibleAt(zoneFirst-90*doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate, iz), 
00745                                                         CountVisibleAt(zoneFirst-120*doc->trackermodel.m_frameRate, iz) );
00746                                         }
00747 
00748                                         // WRITE: DistanceCovered, AreaCovered
00749                                         srevents->Write("{0:F2},{1:F2}", meters2feet(b->GetDistanceCovered(zoneFirst, zoneLast)/100), metersSQ2feetSQ(b->GetAreaCovered(zoneFirst, zoneLast)/10000));
00750                                         
00751                                         srevents->WriteLine(); 
00752                                         
00753                                         eventCount++;
00754                                 }
00755                         }
00756                 }
00757                 // ======================= CONTINUE WRITE TRACKS ===============================
00758                 // WRITE: TODO: ObjectsZonesShopped, TrackedToExit
00759                 srtracks->Write("{0},{1},", eventCount, " ");
00760                 
00761                 // WRITE: UserDefinedTag1, UserDefinedTag2
00762                 for (int i=0;i<values2names->Count;i++) {
00763                         CString value;
00764                         if (b->tags.Lookup(CString(values2names[i]), value)) {
00765                                 if (value == "Select...")
00766                                         value = "";
00767                                 srtracks->Write("{0}", gcnew String(value));
00768                         }
00769                         if (i< values2names->Count-1)
00770                                 srtracks->Write(",");
00771 
00772                 }
00773                 srtracks->WriteLine(); 
00774 
00775 
00776                 StepProgressDialog();
00777         }
00778         
00779         // ============================ WRITE ZONES =================================
00780         for (POSITION posZ = doc->zonemodel.zone.GetStartPosition();posZ;) {
00781                 int id; FloorRegion *z;
00782                 doc->zonemodel.zone.GetNextAssoc(posZ, id, z);
00783                 srzones->WriteLine("{0},{1}", id, gcnew String(z->label)); 
00784         }
00785 
00786         srtracks->Close();
00787         srevents->Close();
00788         srzones->Close();
00789 }
00790 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00791 void TrackingData::DrawFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00792         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00793         while (pos) {
00794                 int i; BodyPath *bp;
00795                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, bp);
00796                 bp->DrawFloor(frame, color, doc, 300);
00797         }
00798 }
00799 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00800 void TrackingData::DrawHeatmap(IplImage* motionmap) {
00801         // for each body path, draw a circle on the floor where it was; and add it to the heatmap image
00802         // NOTE: due to scaling, circle becomes an ellipse
00803         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00804         while (pos) {
00805                 StepProgressDialog();
00806                 int i; BodyPath *bp;
00807                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, bp);
00808                 bp->DrawHeatMap(motionmap, doc);
00809         }
00810 }
00811 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00812 void TrackingData::DrawTracksFloor(IplImage* frame, CvScalar color) {
00813         POSITION pos = data.GetStartPosition();
00814         while (pos) {
00815                 StepProgressDialog();
00816                 int i; BodyPath *bp;
00817                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos, i, bp);
00818                 bp->DrawTrackFloor(frame, colorFromID(bp->id), doc, 1);
00819         }
00820 }
00821 // -------------  Methods with pop-up prompts -------------------------------
00822 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00823 void TrackingData::EditInfoID( int id )
00824 {
00825         BodyPath *bp;
00826         if (data.Lookup(id, bp)) {
00827                 // load tag info from BodyPath
00828                 NameValueCollection^ coll = gcnew NameValueCollection();
00829                 POSITION pos;
00830                 CString key, value;
00831                 for( pos = bp->tags.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL; )
00832                 {
00833                         bp->tags.GetNextAssoc(pos, key, value);
00834                         String ^skey = gcnew String(key);
00835                         String ^svalue = gcnew String(value);
00836                         coll->Add(skey, svalue);
00837                 }
00838                 // Show Dialog
00839                 NewVision::PedestrianTags ^infoDlg = gcnew NewVision::PedestrianTags(coll);
00840                 infoDlg->Text = String::Format("Information for ID = {0}", id);
00841                 if (infoDlg->ShowDialog() == ::DialogResult::OK) {
00842                         // save tag info to BodyPath
00843                         NameValueCollection^ coll = gcnew NameValueCollection();
00844                         infoDlg->ExportTags(coll);
00845                         bp->tags.RemoveAll();
00846                         for (int i=0;i<coll->Count;i++) 
00847                                 bp->tags.SetAt(CString(coll->GetKey(i)), CString(coll->GetValues(i)[0]));
00848                 }
00849                 delete infoDlg;
00850                 delete coll;
00851         }
00852 }
00853 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00854 void TrackingData::MergeID( int id1 )
00855 {
00856         String ^s = String::Format("Merge ID = {0} with: ", id1);
00857         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00858         int id2 = -1;   
00859         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Merge tracks", CString(s)) != IDOK)
00860                 return;
00861         CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00862         id2 = _atoi64(strResult);
00863 
00864         // merge in tracking history
00865         if (!MergeID(id2, id1)) {
00866                 AfxMessageBox("Track to merge with not found!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00867                 return;
00868         }
00869 
00870         // replace id1's in current tracking
00871         doc->bodymodel.body.ChangeID(id1, id2);
00872         doc->bodymodel.body_deleted.ChangeID(id1, id2);
00873 
00874         // if ID was the last one, then update last_id
00875         if (id1 == doc->bodymodel.last_id-1 && id2 < doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00876                 doc->bodymodel.last_id--;
00877         if (id2 > doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00878                 doc->bodymodel.last_id = id2+1;
00879 }
00880 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00881 void TrackingData::AppendID( int id1 )
00882 {
00883         String ^s = String::Format("Append ID = {0} as a new segment to: ", id1);
00884         CTextEntryDlg dlgTextEntry;
00885         if (dlgTextEntry.Show(NULL, "Append segment", CString(s)) != IDOK)
00886                 return;
00887 
00888         CString strResult = dlgTextEntry.GetText();
00889         int id2 = _atoi64(strResult);
00890 
00891         // append in tracking history
00892         if (!AppendID(id2, id1)) {
00893                 AfxMessageBox("Track to append to not found!", MB_ICONINFORMATION | MB_OK);
00894                 return;
00895         }
00896 
00897         // replace id1's in current tracking
00898         doc->bodymodel.body.ChangeID(id1, id2);
00899         doc->bodymodel.body_deleted.ChangeID(id1, id2);
00900 
00901         // if ID was the last one, then update last_id
00902         if (id1 == doc->bodymodel.last_id-1 && id2 < doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00903                 doc->bodymodel.last_id--;
00904         if (id2 > doc->bodymodel.last_id-1)
00905                 doc->bodymodel.last_id = id2+1;
00906 }

00921 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00922 void TrackingData::AutoMerge( int maxFrames, double maxDist, double minOtherDist )
00923 {
00924         // Merges all tracks that ended and began near the same time and the same place
00925         CMap<int, int&, int, int&> keysToDelete;
00926         int dummy, nMerges = 0;
00927         for (POSITION pos1 = data.GetStartPosition();pos1;) {
00928                 // get a track
00929                 int id1; BodyPath *b1;
00930                 data.GetNextAssoc(pos1, id1, b1);
00931                 // if path is marked for deletion
00932                 if (keysToDelete.Lookup(id1, dummy))
00933                         continue;
00934                 int first1, last1, first2, last2;
00935                 b1->GetFirstAndLastVisible(first1, last1);
00936                 
00937                 // for all other tracks
00938                 bool othersFound = false;
00939                 BodyPath *bClosest1 = NULL, *bClosest2 = NULL;
00940                 double minDistSoFar = DBL_MAX;
00941                 for (POSITION pos2 = data.GetStartPosition();pos2;) {
00942                         int id2; BodyPath *b2;
00943                         data.GetNextAssoc(pos2, id2, b2);
00944                         if (id2 == id1)
00945                                 continue;
00946                         // if path is marked for deletion
00947                         if (keysToDelete.Lookup(id2, dummy))
00948                                 continue;
00949                         b2->GetFirstAndLastVisible(first2, last2);
00950                         // find first and second closest to the tail of b1
00951                         if (first2-last1 < maxFrames && first2-last1 > 0) {
00952                                 double dd = d(b2->GetAt(first2-b2->startFrame).p, b1->GetAt(last1-b1->startFrame).p);
00953                                 if (dd < maxDist) {
00954                                         if (!bClosest1)
00955                                                 bClosest1 = b2;
00956                                         else if (dd < minDistSoFar) {
00957                                                 bClosest1 = b2;
00958                                                 minDistSoFar = dd;
00959                                         }
00960                                         else if (dd < minOtherDist) {
00961                                                 othersFound = true;
00962                                                 break;
00963                                         }
00964                                 }       
00965                         }
00966                 }
00967                 // no close tracklets found or others close-by  => continue
00968                 if (!bClosest1 || othersFound)
00969                         continue;
00970 
00971                 nMerges++;
00972                 b1->Merge(bClosest1);
00973                 keysToDelete[bClosest1->id] = 1;
00974                 StepProgressDialog();
00975         }
00976 
00977         for (POSITION pos1 = keysToDelete.GetStartPosition();pos1;) {
00978                 int i, dummy;
00979                 keysToDelete.GetNextAssoc(pos1, i, dummy);
00980                 data.RemoveKey(i);
00981         }
00982         AfxMessageBox(CString(Convert::ToString(nMerges, 10)));
00983 }

01020 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01021 void ActivityData::Clear() {
01022         sActivity.RemoveAll();
01023         sEvent.RemoveAll();
01024         SwarmEvent::last_id = 0;
01025         SwarmActivity::last_id = 0;
01026 }
01027 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------

01030 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01031 void ActivityData::Serialize(CArchive& ar) {
01032         // ------------ Export Swarm Event Data ------------------
01033         ar.IsStoring() ?
01034                 ShowProgressDialog("Exporting event data to .activity file...", sEvent.GetCount()) :
01035                 ShowProgressDialog("Importing event data from .activity file...", sEvent.GetCount());
01036         sEvent.Serialize(ar);
01037         // TEMP
01038         for (POSITION pos = sEvent.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
01039                 int nid; SwarmEvent* ev;
01040                 sEvent.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, ev);
01041                 if (nid > 75)
01042                         sEvent.RemoveKey(nid);
01043 //              if (nid != 5 && nid != 6 && nid != 7 && nid != 69 && nid != 80 && nid != 82)
01044 //                      sEvent.RemoveKey(nid);
01045         }
01046         // END TEMP
01047         HideProgressDialog();
01048 
01049         // ------------ Export Swarm Activity Data ------------------
01050         ar.IsStoring() ?
01051                 ShowProgressDialog("Exporting activity data to .activity file...", sActivity.GetCount()) :
01052                 ShowProgressDialog("Importing activity data from .activity file...", sActivity.GetCount());
01053         sActivity.Serialize(ar);
01054         HideProgressDialog();
01055 }

01057 void ActivityData::ImportFromCVML(CString fname) {
01058 }
01059 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01060 void ActivityData::ExportToCVML(CString fname) {
01061 }
01062 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01063 void ActivityData::ImportFromCSV(CString fname) {       
01064 }
01065 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01066 void ActivityData::ExportToCSV(CString fname) {
01067         StreamWriter^ sr = File::CreateText(gcnew String(fname));
01068         // ------------ Export Swarm Event Data ------------------
01069         ShowProgressDialog("Exporting event data to CSV file...", sEvent.GetCount());
01070         sr->WriteLine("EventName, EventID, Type, Start-Stop, Confidence, ID0, ID1, ID2, ..., ..."); 
01071         POSITION posE = sEvent.GetStartPosition();
01072         while (posE) {
01073                 int id; SwarmEvent *ev;
01074                 sEvent.GetNextAssoc(posE, id, ev);
01075                 sr->WriteLine(ev->ToString());
01076                 StepProgressDialog();
01077         }
01078         HideProgressDialog();
01079         // ------------ Export Swarm Activity Data ------------------
01080         ShowProgressDialog("Exporting activity data to CSV file...", sActivity.GetCount());
01081         sr->WriteLine("ActivityName, ActivityID, ActivityType, Start-Stop, Confidence, ID0, ID1, ID2, ..., ..."); 
01082         POSITION posA = sActivity.GetStartPosition();
01083         while (posA) {
01084                 int id; SwarmActivity *ac;
01085                 sActivity.GetNextAssoc(posA, id, ac);
01086                 sr->WriteLine(ac->ToString());
01087                 StepProgressDialog();
01088         }
01089         HideProgressDialog();
01090         sr->Close();
01091 }
01092 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01093 int ActivityData::GetLastEventID() {
01094         POSITION pos = sEvent.GetStartPosition();
01095         int lastID = 0;
01096         while (pos) {
01097                 int id; SwarmEvent *p;
01098                 sEvent.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
01099                 lastID = max(id, lastID);
01100         }
01101         return lastID;
01102 }
01103 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
01104 int ActivityData::GetLastActivityID() {
01105         POSITION pos = sActivity.GetStartPosition();
01106         int lastID = 0;
01107         while (pos) {
01108                 int id; SwarmActivity *p;
01109                 sActivity.GetNextAssoc(pos, id, p);
01110                 lastID = max(id, lastID);
01111         }
01112         return lastID;
01113 }
